attributes.title: worst app ever

attributes.title: WOST APP EVER
attributes.review: This is the worst app in the world omg! It keeps glitching 24/7 and it’s not just my phone this app was made so poorly it almost broke my phone and made it glitch out if u have the money to buy a new get this app but if you don’t prepare for your phone to break and also in this app there weird farting noises coming out of nowhere when I would click something and also the sound of the app scared my dog and we had to take her to the doctor it was so sad this app has done nothing but bad for me I hate so much it needs to be taken down

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: I was trying to become one with technology and support my amazing president🧚🏼‍♀️🧚🏼‍♀️but then i asked him why they called him bunker boy and then he just simply said “because I hid in a bunker because I was scared that gen z was going to get me”✨it is so absurd that gen z would scare our president 🧚🏼‍♀️but the most horrible thing was when I asked him how he made his hair look so elegant and he said that he sticker it on with supper glue✨🧚🏼‍♀️so i tried that and now I can’t get my cats hairs off of my head don’t download this app it will make you end up in a mental hospital✨🧚🏼‍♀️🧚🏼‍♀️

attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS APP
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and then went to go get ice cream from my fridge. When I opened my freezer I saw a truly terrifying sight. Looking up at me was Donald Trump but he looked like Voldemort in the 4th Harry Potter book you know when he looks like a sick baby. He looked up at me and said, “thank you for helping me defeat Sleepy Joe,” in a low, whiny voice. I don’t know how he got into my freezer but he was definitely eating my ice cream too! I wish I could give this app 0 stars. I will not be voting for him in November either. He clearly does not care about anyone but himself. He ate my ice cream!!!!

attributes.title: 🌈🧚‍♀️💫🧚‍♂️✨🧚
attributes.review:
I can’t! I can’t! I canNOT TOLERATE THIS ANY LONGER!! I was hoping this app would be helpful and try to learn what our current president has planned for the future, but the app won’t even open. My phone restarted itself the first time!!! IT NEVER DOES THAT! Then after, my phone just begin to crash no matter which app I was on. Whether it be TikTok, Instagram, Twitter, Tumblr, Wattpad, Snapchat, or even my Google Classroom!! Being a student and the next generation of the US, I will not tolerate this app corrupting my phone.

🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈

attributes.title: Terrible App
attributes.review: I downloaded the app and suddenly all my social media, text, email were flood with propaganda. It doesn’t stop day and night. It is like if you give the app permission to invade you entire life. I uninstalled the app and it didn’t work, I feel that my privacy have been invaded. Please I urged everyone to not use personal information in the app because you will receive hundreds of emails, text message etc. Every day. I don’t know what to do. 😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭

attributes.title: extremely dissatisfied 😜🙄
attributes.review:
I opened the app and immediately I was spammed with pictures of big bootied girls and honestly at first I was like wait a minute.... I don’t mind this! ❤️ until as I started scrolling through,
pictures of government officials in bikinis started popping up... and let me tell u sister I was not happy. i am extremely traumatized. i have to go and see my therapist 8 times a day now because I have been put through so much stress. the imagine of mike pence in a thong will FOREVER be engraved into my brain. I will be pursuing legal action
💞yours truly

attributes.title: I hate this
attributes.review: I did not find this app helpful in anyway this app was scary I just saw an orange man standing in front of the app and it scared the hell out of me but for some what he do he do be looking like the witch from Minecraft please don’t select Trump again for next president election this app scary please get it to one star review it could be banned off of Apple store if 100% one star review and that I would be very glad thank you I hope Barron and Donald Trump‘s wife are doing good there like a favorite cousin to me but I’ve never met them before Barron is hot😅💀🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊

When Daddy Cheeto told me to download this app I thought ✨uwu✨but then it turns out he was a big old meanie. I thought this was my chance to finally tell off the big bad pumpkin about how mad he made me but it turned out that a big, scary monster called Trump appeared. I was so scared I threw my phone off my roof and now I can’t find it. 

How am I writing this review you ask? Well I’ll tell you, silly head! I used allllll the big ego waves floating off of the bad man to help me get WiFi access!! It was so great and I can’t wait to find my phone again

💕💕💕💕
